title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, gather requirements, and create a detailed project plan.

title: Architecture and Design
description: Design the system architecture, define data models, create technical specifications. Ensure the architecture is modular, scalable, maintainable, and follows microservices and event-driven design principles. Data models to include users, courses, progress tracking, and other entities. Specify APIs, data flows, and integration points. Address security, performance, and error handling requirements; include details on authentication, authorization, rate limiting, caching, and logging. Utilize containerized solutions like Docker and Kubernetes for deployment. Consider adding sections for testing strategies, documentation standards, accessibility guidelines, and post-deployment monitoring strategies. Provide examples or diagrams where necessary to aid in understanding the proposed design. Update the rfc_state field to 'IMPLEMENTATION_IN_PROGRESS' once work begins.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and implement the frontend functionality.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the server-side logic, APIs, and integration with external services.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the platform adheres to security best practices and compliance requirements.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing activities to ensure the platform's quality and functionality.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the platform.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the platform.
